News & Contact

We welcome enquiries and offers of support — click here to email us — though we regret that due to the volume of email we now receive, we are not able to respond personally to all messages. (Please accept our apologies, if we don’t get back to you.)

If you have a media query, please consult our Resources page and our page of previous media coverage, in case you can find the answers to your questions there.

We have a mailing list, CSER News, for News and Announcements. Please click here to subscribe. You can find a list of our previous newsletters in the archive below.

Thank you for your interest in CSER.

HP, MJR & JT
